35 /* Author: Robert Haschke
36  Desc: PropertyMap stores variables of stages

39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/properties.h>
40 #include <boost/format.hpp>
41 #include <functional>
42 #include <ros/console.h>

44 namespace moveit {
45 namespace task_constructor {
46 
47 const std::string LOGNAME = "Properties";
48 
49 class PropertyTypeRegistry
50 {
51  struct Entry
52  {
53  std::string name_;
54  PropertySerializerBase::SerializeFunction serialize_;
55  PropertySerializerBase::DeserializeFunction deserialize_;
56  };
57  Entry dummy_;
58 
59  // map from type_info to corresponding converter functions
60  typedef std::map<std::type_index, Entry> RegistryMap;
61  RegistryMap types_;
62  // map from type names (type.name or ROS msg name) to entry in types_
63  using TypeNameMap = std::map<std::string, RegistryMap::iterator>;
64  TypeNameMap names_;
65 
66 public:
67  PropertyTypeRegistry()
68  : dummy_{ "", PropertySerializerBase::dummySerialize, PropertySerializerBase::dummyDeserialize } {}
69  inline bool insert(const std::type_index& type_index, const std::string& type_name,
70  PropertySerializerBase::SerializeFunction serialize,
71  PropertySerializerBase::DeserializeFunction deserialize);
72 
73  const Entry& entry(const std::type_index& type_index) const {
74  auto it = types_.find(type_index);
75  if (it == types_.end()) {
76  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Unregistered type: " << type_index.name());
77  return dummy_;
78  }
79  return it->second;
80  }
81  const Entry& entry(const std::string& type_name) const {
82  auto it = names_.find(type_name);
83  if (it == names_.end())
84  return dummy_;
85  return it->second->second;
86  }
87 };
88 static PropertyTypeRegistry REGISTRY_SINGLETON;
89 
90 bool PropertyTypeRegistry::insert(const std::type_index& type_index, const std::string& type_name,
91  PropertySerializerBase::SerializeFunction serialize,
92  PropertySerializerBase::DeserializeFunction deserialize) {
93  if (type_index == std::type_index(typeid(boost::any)))
94  return false;
95 
96  auto it_inserted = types_.insert(std::make_pair(type_index, Entry{ type_name, serialize, deserialize }));
97  if (!it_inserted.second)
98  return false; // was already registered before
99 
100  if (!type_name.empty()) // register type_name too?
101  names_.insert(std::make_pair(type_name, it_inserted.first));
102 
103  return true;
104 }
105 
106 bool PropertySerializerBase::insert(const std::type_index& type_index, const std::string& type_name,
107  PropertySerializerBase::SerializeFunction serialize,
108  PropertySerializerBase::DeserializeFunction deserialize) {
109  return REGISTRY_SINGLETON.insert(type_index, type_name, serialize, deserialize);
110 }
111 
112 Property::Property(const type_info& type_info, const std::string& description, const boost::any& default_value)
113  : description_(description), type_info_(type_info), default_(default_value), value_(), initialized_from_(-1) {
114  // default value's type should match declared type by construction
115  assert(default_.empty() || default_.type() == type_info_ || type_info_ == typeid(boost::any));
116  reset();
117 }
118 
119 Property::Property() : Property(typeid(boost::any), "", boost::any()) {}
120 
121 void Property::setValue(const boost::any& value) {
122  setCurrentValue(value);
123  default_ = value_;
124  initialized_from_ = 0;
125 }
126 
127 void Property::setCurrentValue(const boost::any& value) {
128  if (!value.empty() && type_info_ != typeid(boost::any) && value.type() != type_info_)
129  throw Property::type_error(value.type().name(), type_info_.name());
130 
131  value_ = value;
132  initialized_from_ = 1; // manually initialized TODO: use enums
133 }
134 
135 void Property::setDefaultValue(const boost::any& value) {
136  if (!value.empty() && type_info_ != typeid(boost::any) && value.type() != type_info_)
137  throw Property::type_error(value.type().name(), type_info_.name());
138 
139  default_ = value;
140 }
141 
142 void Property::reset() {
143  if (initialized_from_ == 0) // TODO: use enum
144  return; // keep manually set values
145  boost::any().swap(value_);
146  initialized_from_ = -1; // set to max value
147 }
148 
149 std::string Property::serialize(const boost::any& value) {
150  if (value.empty())
151  return "";
152  return REGISTRY_SINGLETON.entry(value.type()).serialize_(value);
153 }
154 
155 boost::any Property::deserialize(const std::string& type_name, const std::string& wire) {
156  if (type_name != Property::typeName(typeid(std::string)) && wire.empty())
157  return boost::any();
158  else
159  return REGISTRY_SINGLETON.entry(type_name).deserialize_(wire);
160 }
161 
162 std::string Property::typeName() const {
163  if (value().empty())
164  return typeName(type_info_);
165  else
166  return typeName(value().type());
167 }
168 
169 std::string Property::typeName(const type_info& type_info) {
170  if (type_info == typeid(boost::any))
171  return "";
172  else
173  return REGISTRY_SINGLETON.entry(type_info).name_;
174 }
175 
176 bool Property::initsFrom(Property::SourceFlags source) const {
177  return source & source_flags_;
178 }
179 
180 Property& Property::configureInitFrom(SourceFlags source, const Property::InitializerFunction& f) {
181  if (source != source_flags_ && initializer_)
182  throw error("Property was already configured for initialization from another source id");
183 
184  source_flags_ = f ? source : SourceFlags();
185  initializer_ = f;
186  return *this;
187 }
188 
189 Property& Property::configureInitFrom(SourceFlags source, const std::string& name) {
190  return configureInitFrom(source, [name](const PropertyMap& other) { return fromName(other, name); });
191 }
192 
193 Property& PropertyMap::declare(const std::string& name, const Property::type_info& type_info,
194  const std::string& description, const boost::any& default_value) {
195  auto it_inserted = props_.insert(std::make_pair(name, Property(type_info, description, default_value)));
196  // if name was already declared, the new declaration should match in type (except it was boost::any)
197  if (!it_inserted.second && it_inserted.first->second.type_info_ != typeid(boost::any) &&
198  type_info != it_inserted.first->second.type_info_)
199  throw Property::type_error(type_info.name(), it_inserted.first->second.type_info_.name());
200  return it_inserted.first->second;
201 }
202 
203 bool PropertyMap::hasProperty(const std::string& name) const {
204  auto it = props_.find(name);
205  return it != props_.end();
206 }
207 
208 Property& PropertyMap::property(const std::string& name) {
209  auto it = props_.find(name);
210  if (it == props_.end())
211  throw Property::undeclared(name);
212  return it->second;
213 }
214 
215 void PropertyMap::exposeTo(PropertyMap& other, const std::set<std::string>& properties) const {
216  for (const std::string& name : properties)
217  exposeTo(other, name, name);
218 }
219 
220 void PropertyMap::exposeTo(PropertyMap& other, const std::string& name, const std::string& other_name) const {
221  const Property& p = property(name);
222  other.declare(other_name, p.type_info_, p.description_, p.default_);
223 }
224 
225 void PropertyMap::configureInitFrom(Property::SourceFlags source, const std::set<std::string>& properties) {
226  for (auto& pair : props_) {
227  if (properties.empty() || properties.count(pair.first))
228  try {
229  pair.second.configureInitFrom(source, std::bind(&fromName, std::placeholders::_1, pair.first));
230  } catch (Property::error& e) {
231  e.setName(pair.first);
232  throw;
233  }
234  }
235 }
236 
237 template <>
238 void PropertyMap::set<boost::any>(const std::string& name, const boost::any& value) {
239  auto range = props_.equal_range(name);
240  if (range.first == range.second) { // name is not yet declared
241  if (value.empty())
242  throw Property::undeclared(name, "trying to set undeclared property '" + name + "' with NULL value");
243  auto it = props_.insert(range.first, std::make_pair(name, Property(value.type(), "", boost::any())));
244  it->second.setValue(value);
245  } else
246  range.first->second.setValue(value);
247 }
248 
249 void PropertyMap::setCurrent(const std::string& name, const boost::any& value) {
250  property(name).setCurrentValue(value);
251 }
252 
253 const boost::any& PropertyMap::get(const std::string& name) const {
254  return property(name).value();
255 }
256 
257 size_t PropertyMap::countDefined(const std::vector<std::string>& list) const {
258  size_t count = 0u;
259  for (const std::string& name : list) {
260  if (!get(name).empty())
261  ++count;
262  }
263  return count;
264 }
265 
266 void PropertyMap::reset() {
267  for (auto& pair : props_)
268  pair.second.reset();
269 }
270 
271 void PropertyMap::performInitFrom(Property::SourceFlags source, const PropertyMap& other) {
272  for (auto& pair : props_) {
273  Property& p = pair.second;
274 
275  // don't override value previously set by higher-priority source
276  // MANUAL > CURRENT > PARENT > INTERFACE
277  if (p.initialized_from_ < source && p.defined())
278  continue;
279  // is the property configured for initialization from this source?
280  if (!p.initsFrom(source))
281  continue;
282 
283  boost::any value;
284  try {
285  value = p.initializer_(other);
286  } catch (const Property::undeclared&) {
287  // ignore undeclared
288  continue;
289  } catch (const Property::undefined&) {
290  }
291 
292  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, pair.first << ": " << p.initialized_from_ << " -> " << source << ": "
293  << Property::serialize(value));
294  p.setCurrentValue(value);
295  p.initialized_from_ = source;
296  }
297 }
298 
299 boost::any fromName(const PropertyMap& other, const std::string& other_name) {
300  return other.get(other_name);
301 }
302 
303 Property::error::error(const std::string& msg) : std::runtime_error(msg), msg_("Property: " + msg) {}
304 
305 void Property::error::setName(const std::string& name) {
306  property_name_ = name;
307  // compose message from property name and runtime_errors' msg
308  msg_ = "Property '" + name + "': " + std::runtime_error::what();
309 }
310 
311 Property::undeclared::undeclared(const std::string& name, const std::string& msg) : Property::error(msg) {
312  setName(name);
313 }
314 
315 Property::undefined::undefined(const std::string& name, const std::string& msg) : Property::error(msg) {
316  setName(name);
317 }
318 
319 static boost::format TYPE_ERROR_FMT("type (%1%) doesn't match property's declared type (%2%)");
320 Property::type_error::type_error(const std::string& current_type, const std::string& declared_type)
321  : Property::error(boost::str(TYPE_ERROR_FMT % current_type % declared_type)) {}
